title: English children: life in the city
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/City and town life

description: Junior grade, social studies film showing English family life in the City of York, stressing daily activities of the children. Points out aspects of English home life and presents authentic events in a modern school, on the playground, at a cricket match, and at a grocery store. Concludes with a family holiday trip by train to a nearby seaside resort.
